name: HispaZone
tag_list: information-technology, news, reviews, consumer-electronics, publication, spanish, website, desktop-computer, computer, laptop, smartphone, tablet, processor, cpu, gpu, motherboard
overview:
HispaZone is a computer and consumer electronics Internet publication based in Spain. It provides the enthusiasts with the latest news and reviews about the most popular and trendy products of the IT industry.

A day doesn’t go by without news posts and reviews about the most desired desktop computer components such as microprocessors, graphic cards, motherboards, enclosures, memory, SSD drives, sound cards, cooling systems and peripherals such as displays, keyboards, mice and other gaming gear. Mobile devices such as laptops, tablets, smartphones and other consumer electronics are also widely covered on a daily basis.

Javier Rodriguez is the editor-in-chief and lab manager at HispaZone and he is considered to be one of the biggest experts in Spain as IT editor with more than 20 years of experience.

Javier, being an enthusiast himself, leads the editor team making sure that the focus remains in brining their passion for technology to enthusiasts and consumers through the most relevant information updates and detailed articles about the most interesting products on the market.

HispaZone’s lab is equipped with many test systems and performance measuring devices able to stress any IT product in ways that help prove their value to the consumer. The results gathered from the tests are shown at the review articles together with the editor’s opinion of the product based on the experience with it.

HispaZone works closely with all the mayor IT product manufacturers such as Intel, AMD, nVidia, ASUS, MSI, ASRock, Cooler Master, Enermax, OCZ, Samsung, HTC, Sony and many more. This makes possible to bring the latest news with no delays and reviews of most relevant products as soon as they hit the market.

HispaZone keeps a passive advertising business philosophy, with ads that avoid annoying the reader but catch their attention by being placed on strategic areas throughout the website. Ads are booked for specific periods on a monthly basis.
